name: Boco Pendant
effects: Increase ATK, DEF, MAG, SPR, HP and MP by 10%
Gain Brave (Auto) (30211) at the start of a battle
Gain Faith (Auto) (30221) at the start of a battle

name: Boco Pendant
波可護身符
보코의 부적
Pendentif de Boko
Bokos Amulett
Pendiente de Boko
desc_short: Boost HP, MP, ATK, DEF, MAG, and SPR by 10% and boost ATK and MAG each turn
提高10%HPMP、攻擊防禦魔力精神的數值+每回合提高攻擊魔力的數值
HP, MP, 공격력, 방어력, 마력, 정신력 10% 상승+매 턴마다 공격력과 마력 상승
Augmente PV/PM/ATT/DEF/MAGIE/PSY de 10% et augmente ATT/MAGIE à chaque tour
LP, MP, ANG, ABW, MAG und PSY hoch um 10%, erhöht jede Runde ANG und MAG.
Aumenta VIT, PM, ATQ, DEF, MAG y ESP un 10% y ATQ y MAG aumentan cada turno
desc_long: Boosts HP, MP, ATK, DEF, MAG, and SPR by 10% and boosts ATK and MAG each turn.
提高10%HPMP、攻擊防禦魔力精神的數值，同時每回合提高攻擊魔力的數值。
HP, MP, 공격력, 방어력, 마력, 정신력이 10% 상승하고, 매 턴마다 공격력과 마력이 상승합니다.
Augmente PV/PM/ATT/DEF/MAGIE/PSY de 10% et augmente ATT/MAGIE à chaque tour
LP, MP, ANG, ABW, MAG und PSY hoch um 10%, erhöht jede Runde ANG und MAG.
Aumenta la VIT, los PM, el ATQ, la DEF, la MAG y el ESP un 10% y el ATQ y la MAG aumentan cada turno.
